issue.title: After saving an item with accessscope 'category', category is not showed on net edit
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

After saving an item with access scope 'category', category is not showed on net edit:
* I edit a resource (or else, a diffusion etc)
* I set access scope to category, then choose some categories
* Save
(Access scope and categories are saved correctly)
* If I reopen -> access scope is still set to categories, but no category is show in list

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Yves,

This issue is assigned to you but we can take it in charge on our side.
Have you already worked on it or can we affect such ticket to us?

Thanks

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

It's done, I just wait to commit it with other tickets under progress: #770 & #740

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

in my sandbox: svn://127.0.0.1:13690/easysdi/sandboxes/asit-vd/4.2.x
